quotes.quote: Successful weight loss takes programming, not willpower.
While weight loss is important, what's more important is the quality of food you put in your body - food is information that quickly changes your metabolism and genes.
You know what the secret to weight loss is? Don't eat much.
Eat, drink and be merry, for tomorrow ye diet.
If you wish to grow thinner, diminish your dinner.
One way to get thin is to re-establish a purpose in life.
When we lose twenty pounds... we may be losing the twenty best pounds we have! We may be losing the pounds that contain our genius, our humanity, our love and honesty.
Inside some of us is a thin person struggling to get out, but they can usually be sedated with a few pieces of chocolate cake.
To lengthen your life, shorten your meals.

Both belly bulge and love handles are about excess body fat, not lack of muscle. Crunches and ab exercises are therefore not the solution. The best way to reduce these problem areas is to reduce your overall body fat percentage, and we all know that that requires diet and exercise.
For 24 years of my adult life, by choice I weighed well over 200 lbs. I say by choice because you see I have never accidentally eaten anything.
We never repent of having eaten too little.
The sovereign invigorator of the body is exercise, and of all the exercises walking is the best.
The time for action is now. It's never too late to do something.
Ultimately, the only power to which man should aspire is that which he exercises over himself.
Never use food as a drug. But feel free to use exercise as an anti-depressant.

Eat your vegetables. Brush your teeth. Sweat once in a while. Get plenty of rest. Don't smoke. Laugh more. There are certain tenets to health that are pretty commonsensical and that we all know we should practice routinely.
Anything you adopt temporarily only begets temporary results, and fluctuating your weight up and down is not lifespan favorable.
One of the great things about juicing is that you know exactly what you're putting into your body something most of us simply can't claim on a daily basis.
Eat less, taste more.
The biggest weight loss secret? Manage your emotions or they will keep mismanaging you.
Take care of your body. It's the only place you have to live.
If you're not doing what is best for your body, you are the one who lose.
Frequently, visualization is the key to lose weight. Imagine yourself with your desired body, and work for it. At some point in the future, this wish will come true.
God gave you a body that can lodge almost. Only need to convince the mind
Don't dig your own grave with your knife and fork.
The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.
I know what I have to do if I want to lose weight and stay healthy: eat a proper diet and exercise. All I've got to do is apply it.
The more you allow yourself to desire a healthy and thin body, and you embrace the picture of this body, the more you'll be able to make it a reality.
In order to succeed at losing weight, you need to stop punishing yourself for failing with your healthy eating plan. Fully love and accept yourself, and everything will be a lot easier.
